diff_act: 6.add devices to the affected devices list
7.remove devices from the affected devices list

regen.absent_element: saving changes to user accounts after remote modification
regen.new_specification: The system shall save the changes made to user accounts after remote modification.
The system shall validate the changes made to the configuration before saving them to ensure data integrity and consistency.

regen.absent_element: error handling for failed authentication or authorization
regen.new_specification: The system shall display an error message and prevent configuration changes when authentication or authorization fails.

label: The option to configure device rules shall require an additional login password for that option.
absence: an additional login password for configuring device rules
